column2:
"Rangers and grenade launchers go together
like peanut butter and chocolate. Like rain and
clouds. Like blood and guts!"

"Grenade launchers make fine long-range
weapons, and their firepower is nothing short
of amazing! They blow hostiles into tiny bits!"

"The explosion a grenade launcher generates
blows away everything in the immediate area, too. Ooh, it's such a thrilling feeling!"

"Soâ€¦ Will you give a grenade launcher a try?
If so, you can have this one. It's one of my own
and it has quite a story behind it. Hee hee!"

"The best way to get up to speed with
a weapon is to get some hands-on experience.
Why not torment some enemies with it?"

"Grenade launchers are ranged weapons that can unleash high-powered attacks
that damage enemies in a wide radius."
"Try basic grenade launcher attacks and photon arts for yourself."
